FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv6 routing-table command displays information about BGP VPNv6 routes and BGP4+ VPN routes based on specified multiple attribute filters. The display bgp vpnv6 routing-table command displays information about BGP VPNv6 routes and BGP4+ VPN routes based on specified multiple attribute filters. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv6 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tableas-path-filter { <as-path-filter-num> | <as-path-filter-name> }

display bgp vpnv6 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablecommunity-filter { { <community-filter-num> | <community-filter-numEx> | <community-filter-name> } | { <community-filter-num> | <community-filter-name> } whole-match }
display bgp vpnv6 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tableextcommunity-filter { <basic-extcomm-flt-num> | <adv-extcomm-flt-num> | <extcommunity-filter-name> }
display bgp vpnv6 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablelarge-community-filter <largeComFilName> [ whole-match ]
display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv6 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tableas-path-filter { <as-path-filter-num> | <as-path-filter-name> }

display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv6 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablecommunity-filter { { <community-filter-num> | <community-filter-numEx> | <community-filter-name> } | { <community-filter-num> | <community-filter-name> } whole-match }
display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv6 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tableextcommunity-filter { <basic-extcomm-flt-num> | <adv-extcomm-flt-num> | <extcommunity-filter-name> }
display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv6 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablelarge-community-filter <largeComFilName> [ whole-match ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays BGP VPNv6 routes and BGP4+ routes of VPN instances.
-

Displays about the BGP routes of a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the name of a community filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-sensitive characters. The string cannot be all digits.

Specifies the number of an AS_Path filter.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 256.

Specifies the name of an AS_Path filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the number of a basic community filter.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 99.

Specifies the number of an advanced community filter.
The value is an integer that ranges from 100 to 199.

Indicates exact match with specified large communities.
-

Specifies the number of a basic extended community filter.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 199.

Specifies the number of an advanced extcommunity filter.
The value is an integer that ranges from 200 to 399.

Specifies the name of an extended community filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 characters.

Specifies the name of a Large-Community filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies a BGP multi-instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp instance a vpnv6 all routing-table as-path-filter pas
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
